mapper.select:
select m.id,m.machine_code,m.machine_status, CONCAT(aa.province, aa.city, aa.district,IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) local_desc, m.net_status,l.type as local_type,m.inside_time,m.machine_type from inno72_machine m left join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id left join inno72_admin_area aa on l.area_code=aa.code where machine_status!=-1 and LEFT(l.area_code,#{num})='${code}'
AND (m.machine_code LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or l.mall LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or l.name LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or l.tag like '%${machineCode}%' )
and m.machine_type=#{machineType} and l.type=#{localType} and m.machine_status=#{machineStatus}
AND (STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') <=STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(m.inside_time,"%Y-%m-%d") ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_FORMAT(m.inside_time,"%Y-%m-%d") ,'%Y-%m-%d') )
and 9=9 order by m.inside_time desc

select m.*, CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall,l.name) local_str from inno72_machine m left join inno72_locale l on m.locale_id=l.id left join inno72_admin_area aa on l.area_code=aa.code where m.id=#{machineId}
select s.machine_code from inno72_machine s where s.machine_status = #{machineStatus}

select * from ( SELECT m.id,m.machine_code,mt.activityName,mt.start_time,mt.end_time,mt.state, CONCAT(area.province,area.city,area.district,IFNULL(locale.mall,""),IFNULL(locale.NAME,"")) AS local_desc,locale.area_code FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON locale.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area on area.code=locale.area_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT apm.machine_id,a.NAME AS activityName, date_format( ap.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( ap.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN ap.start_time > NOW() THEN '1' WHEN ap.start_time < NOW() and ap.end_time > NOW() THEN '2' WHEN ap.end_time < NOW() THEN '3' ELSE null END state FROM inno72_activity_plan_machine apm LEFT JOIN inno72_activity_plan ap ON ap.id = apm.activity_plan_id AND ap.is_delete = 0 and NOW() < ap.end_time LEFT JOIN inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id UNION SELECT im.machine_id, t.`name`AS activityName, date_format( mt.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS start_time, date_format( mt.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS end_time, CASE WHEN mt.start_time > NOW() THEN '1' WHEN mt.start_time < NOW() and mt.end_time > NOW() THEN '2' WHEN mt.end_time < NOW() THEN '3' ELSE null END state FROM inno72_interact t LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine im ON im.interact_id = t.id LEFT JOIN inno72_interact_machine_time mt ON mt.interact_machine_id = im.id WHERE t.is_delete = 0 AND t.`status`=1 and NOW() < mt.end_time ) mt ON mt.machine_id = m.id WHERE m.machine_status = '4'
AND ( #{startTime} <= mt.end_time AND #{endTime} >= mt.start_time )
and LEFT(locale.area_code,#{num})='${code}'
AND ( m.machine_code LIKE '%${machineCode}%' or mt.activityName LIKE '%${machineCode}%')
and mt.state =1 and mt.state =2 and mt.state =3 and 9=9 ) o order by area_code

select distinct am.machine_id as id ,m.machine_code ,if(aa.province=aa.city,CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.district,l.mall), CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall)) local from view_machine_goods am left join inno72_machine m on am.machine_id=m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id= m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code left join ( select machine_id,goods_id,sum(goods_count) goods_count from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id group by sc.machine_id,scg.goods_id ) scg on am.machine_id=scg.machine_id and am.goods_id=scg.goods_id where IFNULL(scg.goods_count,0)<=15

select m.id,m.machine_code ,CONCAT(aa.province, aa.city, aa.district,IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) local from inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code where m.machine_status=4 and m.net_status=0

select g.name as good_name,IFNULL(scg.goods_count,0) as good_count from view_machine_goods am left join inno72_goods g on am.goods_id=g.id left join ( select machine_id,goods_id,sum(goods_count) goods_count from inno72_supply_channel sc left join inno72_supply_channel_goods scg on sc.id=scg.supply_channel_id group by sc.machine_id,scg.goods_id ) scg on am.machine_id=scg.machine_id and am.goods_id=scg.goods_id where am.machine_id=#{machineId}

select m.id ,m.machine_code,count(*) lock_count,if(aa.province=aa.city,CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.district,l.mall), CONCAT_WS('-',aa.province,aa.city,aa.district,l.mall)) local from inno72_machine m left join inno72_supply_channel sc on m.id=sc.machine_id and sc.is_delete=1 LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id= m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area aa on aa.code=l.area_code where sc.id is not null group by m.id order by lock_count desc
